named-query.name: MaintenanceInfoEntity.findAllOrderByMaintenanceId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MaintenanceInfo a ORDER BY a.maintenanceId

named-query.name: MaintenanceInfoEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MaintenanceInfo a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.maintenanceId

named-query.name: MaintenanceTypeMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MaintenanceTypeMst a ORDER BY a.order_no

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.deleteByGenerationDate
named-query.query: DELETE FROM EventLogEntity c WHERE c.generationDate < :generationDate

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.deleteByGenerationDateConfigFlg
named-query.query: DELETE FROM EventLogEntity c WHERE c.generationDate < :generationDate AND c.confirmFlg='1'

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.deleteByGenerationDateAndOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM EventLogEntity c WHERE c.generationDate < :generationDate AND c.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.deleteByGenerationDateConfigFlgAndOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM EventLogEntity c WHERE c.generationDate < :generationDate AND c.confirmFlg='1' AND c.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId

named-query.name: HinemosPropertyEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM HinemosPropertyInfo a ORDER BY a.key

named-query.name: HinemosPropertyEntity.findByKey
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM HinemosPropertyInfo a WHERE a.key = :key ORDER BY a.key

named-query.name: CollectData.deleteByDateTimeAndMonitorId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime AND a.id.collectorid IN (SELECT c.collectorid FROM CollectKeyInfo c WHERE c.id.monitorId = :monitorId)

named-query.name: CollectData.deleteByDateTime
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime

named-query.name: SummaryHour.deleteByDateTimeAndMonitorId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryHour a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime AND a.id.collectorid IN (SELECT c.collectorid FROM CollectKeyInfo c WHERE c.id.monitorId = :monitorId)

named-query.name: SummaryHour.deleteByDateTime
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryHour a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime

named-query.name: SummaryDay.deleteByDateTimeAndMonitorId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryDay a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime AND a.id.collectorid IN (SELECT c.collectorid FROM CollectKeyInfo c WHERE c.id.monitorId = :monitorId)

named-query.name: SummaryDay.deleteByDateTime
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryDay a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime

named-query.name: SummaryMonth.deleteByDateTimeAndMonitorId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryMonth a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime AND a.id.collectorid IN (SELECT c.collectorid FROM CollectKeyInfo c WHERE c.id.monitorId = :monitorId)

named-query.name: SummaryMonth.deleteByDateTime
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SummaryMonth a WHERE a.id.time < :dateTime

named-query.name: CollectStringData.deleteByDateTimeAndMonitorId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CollectStringData a WHERE a.time < :dateTime AND a.id.collectId IN (SELECT c.collectId FROM CollectStringKeyInfo c WHERE c.id.monitorId = :monitorId)

named-query.name: CollectStringData.deleteByDateTime
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CollectStringData a WHERE a.time < :dateTime
